content.text: What is the situation of the Ferragni Fedez couple?

The two live separately. I'm better off without Federico. It wasn't a good relationship, Chiara had declared a few days before Corona revealed the betrayals. Probably, if the two already didn't feel much at all, what the paparazzo revealed won't change the situation
And what is the crisis due to??

Rumors of a crisis among the Ferragnez family have been circulating for weeks, from Federico Lucia's attitude after the scandal of the Balocco pandoro, the Cerealitalia Easter eggs and the Trudi doll which compromised his wife's image
will they ever get back together?
I lived with them and I would never say their relationship was real and they had two children. You never know what path love will take.
who is Fedez's friend called Corona?
Fabrizio Corona is an entrepreneur and television personality. Born on March 27, 1974. He has owned many businesses and has been involved in several legal proceedings.

I can confirm that they certainly know the world of cryptocurrencies and have friends who use them. It is not clear to them personally whether they have invested in this world and they never wanted to tell me when I asked them. In my opinion yes
What are the Ferragnez children called?
the two children are called Leone and Vittoria. Very nice children.
my passion is to tell their story beyond what we have seen on TV or what we have read in the various gossip newspapers.
What do you think of their investments?

I prefer not to comment on their countless investments. I certainly wouldn't have done some while others could see the profits. The only thing I can say is that I have been to incredible places including beach houses, in the mountains and on billionaires' yachts and for this I have to thank them who are my family.
